verses.name: Matthew 12:4
verses.text: How he entered into the house of God, and did eat the shewbread, which was not lawful for him to eat, neither for them which were with him, but only for the priests?

verses.name: Matthew 12:5
verses.text: Or have ye not read in the law, how that on the sabbath days the priests in the temple profane the sabbath, and are blameless?

verses.name: Matthew 12:6
verses.text: But I say unto you, That in this place is one greater than the temple.

verses.name: Matthew 12:7
verses.text: But if ye had known what this meaneth, I will have mercy, and not sacrifice, ye would not have condemned the guiltless.
